name: adrenal gland thickening
description: Evidenced by increased uniform or focal gland thickness on CT or MRI, with the normal limb width typically less than 10 mm; imaging features such as attenuation values, enhancement patterns, and presence of mass effect may assist in differentiating between benign and malignant etiologies.

values.name: absent
values.description: no adrenal gland thickening is present

values.name: indeterminate
values.description: cannot determine whether adrenal gland thickening is present

values.name: unknown
values.description: uncertainty regarding the presence of adrenal gland thickening

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: The anatomical region of the adrenal gland thickening
